name: Lunch Box Frittatas
author: Hugatunity
summary: These are perfect for lunch boxes! Kids love the size and parents love the nutrition. Pack these little frittatas with potato sticks, bread and jam, and fruit. There you have a fun spin on breakfast for lunch! If your kids don't like veggies, just have the meat and cheese. Everything, including spices and type of cheese, is customizable.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Coat a large 6-cup muffin tin with butter
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat
Add tomato, ham, onion powder, and parsley
Cook and stir until tomato is warmed through and juice has evaporated, about 5 minutes
Whisk eggs, Cheddar cheese, and milk together in a large bowl with salt and pepper
Divide the ham mixture among the 6 muffin cups
Cover with egg mixture until about 3/4 full
Place muffin tin in a larger baking pan filled with hot water
Bake in the preheated oven until set, about 25 minutes
Cover with aluminum foil if tops start browning too much
